title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When code assist has nothing to suggest and no changes are made, the file should not be marked as dirty.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty when no changes are made.
SR: Ensure that code assist does not mark the file as dirty when there are no suggestions and no changes are made.
